prototypes.prototype: Context.Session.GetDataFromFile as L (Key as C, ByRef Value as B, Remove as L = .F.)
Context.Session.GetDataFromFile as L (ByRef Value as B, Key as C, Remove as L = .F.)

argument.name: Key as C
argument.description: The key of the session-state variable to be retrieved.

argument.name: ByRef Value as B
argument.description: A reference to a variable to receive the session-state variable value.

argument.name: Remove as L
argument.description: A setting of .T. or .F. to remove the item from the session-state collection after it has been retrieved. This is optional and defaults to .F..

page.description: Gets the value of a key from the session-state collection.
page.discussion: Context.Session.GetDataFromFile() gets the value of a key from the session-state collection. Check Context.Session.CallResult.Success before using the return value.
